title: Stopped playing for a while, lost levels
body: Dropped from level 30 to 25 after not playing for over a year. Is this normal?

replies.body:
Hey Kahow1107, 

It would be best if you're having account issues to submit a ticket. That way Riot Support can help you get this issue resolved, look into it, and answer any questions that you may have. 

Riot Support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

{{champion:25}} {{summoner:4}} {{item:3157}}
